data.title: Yearly & Monthly weather
data.meta_description: Salamanca, Spain - Climate and weather forecast by month. Detailed climate information with charts - average monthly weather with temperature, pressure, humidity, precipitation, wind, daylight, sunshine, visibility, and UV index data. The temperature in Salamanca ranges from a high average of 29.8°C (85.6°F) during the summer months to a low average of 1.1°C (34°F) in the winter month of February. The months with the lowest UV index in Salamanca, Spain, are January, February, November and December, with an average maximum UV index of 2.
data.text:
Average temperature

Salamanca, Spain

The warmest months (with the highest average high temperature) are July and August (29.8°C).

The month with the lowest average high temperature is January (8.5°C).

The month with the highest average low temperature is July (15.6°C).

The coldest month (with the lowest average low temperature) is February (1.1°C).

Average snowfall

Salamanca, Spain

The month with the highest snowfall is February (23mm).

The months with the least snowfall are May, June, July, August, September and October (0mm).

Average snowfall days

Salamanca, Spain

The month with the highest number of snowfall days is January (2.1 days).

The months with the least snowfall days are May, June, July, August, September and October (0 days).

Average daylight / Average sunshine

Salamanca, Spain

The month with the longest days is June (Average daylight: 15h and 6min).

The month with the shortest days is December (Average daylight: 9h and 18min).

The month with the most sunshine is June (Average sunshine: 11h and 24min).

The month with the least sunshine is December (Average sunshine: 6h and 24min).

Average UV index

Salamanca, Spain

The months with the highest UV index are June, July and August (UV index 6).

The months with the lowest UV index are January, February, November and December (UV index 2).

Average visibility

Salamanca, Spain

The months with the highest visibility are February, June, July, August, September, October and December (10km).

The months with the lowest visibility are January, March, April, May and November (9km).
